channel.title: How to go to deep sleep and wake up
channel.description:
Hi. I'm developing an application with WP7605.
I am trying to to to deep sleep mode and wake up when data packet recieved. Please let me know how to wake up using legato API.

item.title: How to go to deep sleep and wake up
item.dc:creator: yoheifujimitsu
item.description:
I comfirmed suspend entry .
And then , suspend exit while TCP packet recieving.
Thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: How to go to deep sleep and wake up

item.title: How to go to deep sleep and wake up
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
the wake up process is automatically done.

You can set up a TCP server with public IP address and first make sure it can receive TCP packet.

Then start eDRX mode, after that send a IP packet to the module and see if it can receive.

Read full topic
item.source: How to go to deep sleep and wake up
